name: Anthony Weintraub
info:
• 简体中文名: 安东尼·温特劳布
  • 别名: アンソニー・ワイントラーブ
  • 引用来源: http://www.imdb.com/name/nm1782101/
detail: Anthony Weintraub has had a broad range of experience in filmmaking, content creation, and storytelling for over 20 years. Beginning as a story editor, research assistant, and script reader, Anthony then started writing for the screen in the early 1990s, primarily as a script doctor, along with directing theater. Anthony also began consulting for non-profits at this time, primarily around using video for communications and branding. In 2003, Anthony branched into global animation with his work on The Animatrix and adaptation of the graphic novel Tekkonkinkreet (Sony). In 2006, Anthony co-founded A-Line Pictures, an independent film company based in New York City, and in 2012 he established yummico, a digital content company focusing on mobile entertainment and education for kids.

works.name: 鉄コン筋クリート / 恶童
